author: andschwa
body:
There is no way around this. The directory where CMake is invoked is where it writes its build files, so we have to `pushd`. In case anything fails, we `popd` in a finally block.

My bad.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Once we can use the module to build on Travis, this kind of thing will get caught.

title: Fix current working directory for CMake
